official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce the contribution limitation for multicandidate political committees with respect to elections for Federal office and to impose additional limitations with respect to congressional elections.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce the multicandidate political committee contribution limit respecting Federal elections. Limits multicandidate political committee contributions to congressional candidates in general, special, or runoff elections.
